description: Monitoring eturnal STUN/TURN service activities. This dashboard uses the 'mod_stats_prometheus' with Prometheus as a data source. More info about eturnal can be found in the web: 'eturnal.net'.

panels.title: Overall system information, errors & peak rates/load

panels.description: *Calculated with historical data from all past sessions for all current open sessions
panels.title: Relay data I/O

panels.description: *Calculated with historical data from all past sessions for all current open sessions
panels.title: Peak rate | transports $transport
Peak # of concurrent open TURN sessions
Current STUN queries, TURN sessions & rates/load

panels.description: *Calculated with historical data from all past sessions for all current open sessions.

targets.expr:
(
    irate(erlang_vm_statistics_bytes_received_total{instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval] offset 1d) +
    irate(erlang_vm_statistics_bytes_received_total{instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval] offset 2d) +
    irate(erlang_vm_statistics_bytes_received_total{instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval] offset 3d) +
    irate(erlang_vm_statistics_bytes_received_total{instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval] offset 4d) +
    irate(erlang_vm_statistics_bytes_received_total{instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval] offset 5d) +
    irate(erlang_vm_statistics_bytes_received_total{instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval] offset 6d) +
    irate(erlang_vm_statistics_bytes_received_total{instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval] offset 7d)
) / 7 / 2

(
    irate(erlang_vm_statistics_bytes_output_total{instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval] offset 1d) +
    irate(erlang_vm_statistics_bytes_output_total{instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval] offset 2d) +
    irate(erlang_vm_statistics_bytes_output_total{instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval] offset 3d) +
    irate(erlang_vm_statistics_bytes_output_total{instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval] offset 4d) +
    irate(erlang_vm_statistics_bytes_output_total{instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval] offset 5d) +
    irate(erlang_vm_statistics_bytes_output_total{instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval] offset 6d) +
    irate(erlang_vm_statistics_bytes_output_total{instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval] offset 7d)
) / 7 / 2

panels.title: Relay data rate | transports $transport

targets.expr:
( 1 - 

  ( sum without (le,instance,job) ( (eturnal_turn_relay_rcvd_bytes_bucket{instance=~"$instance",le=~"$threshold_size"} + eturnal_turn_relay_sent_bytes_bucket{instance=~"$instance",le=~"$threshold_size"}) / 2 ) 
  / ( sum without (le,instance,job) (eturnal_turn_sessions_total{instance=~"$instance"}) ) ) )

* ( sum without (le,instance,job) (eturnal_turn_open_sessions{instance=~"$instance"}) )

( sum without (le,instance,job) ( (eturnal_turn_relay_rcvd_bytes_bucket{instance=~"$instance",le=~"$threshold_size"} + eturnal_turn_relay_sent_bytes_bucket{instance=~"$instance",le=~"$threshold_size"}) / 2 ) 
/ ( sum without (le,instance,job) (eturnal_turn_sessions_total{instance=~"$instance"}) ) )

* ( sum without (le,instance,job) (eturnal_turn_open_sessions{instance=~"$instance"}) )

list.description: Please provide the targeted server 'domain:port' which is targeted with your Prometheus server.
list.label: Target server
list.name: instance

list.description: Choose threshold for session sizes to be labeled as "inactive" / "unused" TURN session.
list.label: Threshold size [in bytes]
list.name: threshold_size

list.description: Selection of protocol errors displayed in the dashboard.
list.label: Protocol errors
list.name: protocol_errors

title: eturnal STUN/TURN server official dashboard
